1.content:
These starting few are just a few of the stories whose characters, and plots, I found to be more enjoyable.

The Freshman: A story about a college freshman whose trying to get through her first year. (Contains a lot of subseries and the main character is a biological female. You can describe her however you like, her name has to be Emily.)

The Crown and The Flame: This story follows two main characters who are Kenna, an exiled queen, and Dom, a man with the ability to control fire. They are trying to save their home and gather allies along the way.

Hero: A story whose main character discovers they have superpowers after they are exposed to a mysterious crystal. (Main Character can be either male or female, so go wild. Must be called Alex.)

High School Story: A new student arrives at Oliver M. Berry High and gets into many different scenarios. (Main Character can be either male or female, must be named Jordan.)

Will edit chapters and change the names if I have to.
1.title: Starting Choices

info.brief_description: The popular app with a shrinking twist.
info.description:
I've read a lot of the stories in Choices and I couldn't help but think that there were quite a few instances where shrinking would definitely be interesting. So now I'm adding an interactive where people can come in and put their own views into this. But first a few grounds rules.

1. NO one sentence chapters. I've noticed that they really don't do much and I will delete them as soon as I find out about them.
2. No scat, toilet, waterworks, farting, and hard vore. I don't personally don't like it, but you can allude to it. Just know describing what happens.
3. Keep the male giants on the down low. By this, I mean that they can be nearby and can talk to the shrunken character(s), but they can't do anything to them.
4. Please use good grammar and try to make the sentences well written. If you need to I recommend getting Grammarly, the free version works just fine, and you don't have to pay for it.
Lastly, if you mess up on a chapter and think you can improve on it, let me know and send me the chapter name. I won't delete things unless they break the rules, or they are incredibly badly written. I hope you guys will add to this interactive.
